## Resources.ResourceManagerBuilder.getBuiltResourcesForContext() method

Gets a read-only array of all [built resources](./ts-res.resources.resource.md) that have at least one candidate that can match the supplied context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBuiltResourcesForContext(context: Context.IValidatedContextDecl, options?: Context.IContextMatchOptions): Result<ReadonlyArray<Resource>>;
```

</td></tr>

options


</td><td>

[Context.IContextMatchOptions](./ts-res.context.icontextmatchoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ [options](./ts-res.context.icontextmatchoptions.md) for the context match.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;ReadonlyArray&lt;[Resource](./ts-res.resources.resource.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

`Success` with an array of [resources](./ts-res.resources.resource.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
